\h(《Vyse》)Looks like the Moon Stone 
fell through the roof. It's 
probably inside the shrine… \e

\h(《Vyse》)Well, then. 
We've got no choice but to go in! \e

\h(《Aika》)Oh, before we go… Is there 
anything left you wanted to do, like 
look for Moonberries? \e

\h(《Aika》)This is the final destination in 
this mini-adventure. You 
won't be able to turn back once you enter. \e

\h(《Vyse》)Oh… Then maybe it would be a good idea to
head back out and explore a little 
bit more. \e

\h(《Vyse》)When we're ready, we'll head into 
the shrine and get the 
Moon Stone! \e
